donate_desc_long: If you like this module and want to support its further development, you can do so on Boosty.
launcher_clear_all_desc:
Adds a button to close all applications in the multitasking menu (Recents).

Supports multiple display modes for integration into the stock interface.
launcher_ca_margin_desc: Adjusts the vertical position of the floating button. The value is a multiplier of the standard margin.
